nodes.text: The MULTI enhanced vision system was a model of enhanced optics suite available for armor during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire following the Battle of Yavin. The system was manufactured by BioTech Industries and sold for  1750. Like all enhanced optics suites, it increased its wearer's awareness of their surroundings through the addition of various sensors to an armor set's helmet.

The MULTI enhanced vision system was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013. The same information was also included in the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook released the following year by Fantasy Flight Games.
